hero.description: Charma is a company based in georgia. Our main goal is to help people who can't help themselves. We hope there are many people who thinks like us.

about.title: TRANSACTIONS
about.header: A better way to help people
about.description: We are doing everything to help poor people. We think kindness should be goal of our lives. Thats why we offer Charma.

product1.title: Fast and simple
product1.description: You can access anyone around the georgia within days and get free stuff or be the one who gives free stuff.

product2.title: Transfers are instant
product2.description: Our sponsors who will receive products will get you as fast as possible. The maximum transfer time will be two days.

product3.title: No hidden fees
product3.description: Usage of Charma is completly free. There are no hidden fees or any other payment system. You can use website without acctualy loose anything.

product4.title: Direct contact
product4.description: Our website offers to contact sellers directly through their phones or emails. That's can save a lot of your time.
